name: 3D Kid's Holiday Spelling Game
description:
Kid's Holiday Word Spelling Game - Word Spelling Game For Children With A Holiday Theme. Holidays - Listen And Spell Game For Children - English. Learn To Spell Words Relating To Holidays / Vacations. 11 Levels....Everything You Might Want to Do... Or See On Holiday. Slide The Letters In The Correct Positions. School Age, Preschool, Kindergarten. Fun and Simple Word Spelling Game For Small Children. Listen And Learn. Speak And Spell. Drag and Drop Letters Into Coloured Containers. Hear the Word First. Learn To Spell 4 and 5 Letter Words. Even Very Small Children Will Be Able To Match The Colours To The Shapes. School Age, Preschool / Kindergarten Kids, Children. Voice And Sound FX Included.

• Kids Holiday Spelling Game - Word Spelling Game For Children With A Holiday Theme.
